trans-unit.source: Extension to add task support for npm scripts.
trans-unit.target: 為 npm 指令碼新增工作支援的延伸模組。

trans-unit.source: NPM support for VS Code
trans-unit.target: VS Code 的 Npm 支援

trans-unit.source: Controls whether npm scripts should be automatically detected.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否自動偵測 npm 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Run npm commands with the `--silent` option.
trans-unit.target: 以 `--silent` 選項執行 npm 命令。

trans-unit.source: The package manager used to run scripts.
trans-unit.target: 用來執行指令碼的套件管理員。

trans-unit.source: Configure glob patterns for folders that should be excluded from automatic script detection.
trans-unit.target: 為應從自動指令碼偵測排除的資料夾設定 Glob 模式。

trans-unit.source: Enable an explorer view for npm scripts when there is no top-level 'package.json' file.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有最上層 'package.json' 檔案時，啟用 npm 指令碼的總管檢視。

trans-unit.source: The default click action used in the npm scripts explorer: `open` or `run`, the default is `open`.
trans-unit.target: npm 指令碼總管中使用的預設按鍵動作:「開啟」或「執行」，預設為「開啟」。

trans-unit.source: Enable running npm scripts contained in a folder from the Explorer context menu.
trans-unit.target: 從 Explorer 操作功能表啟用包含在資料夾中的執行中 NPM 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Fetch data from https://registry.npmjs.org and https://registry.bower.io to provide auto-completion and information on hover features on npm dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 從 https://registry.npmjs.org 和 https://registry.bower.io 擷取資料，以提供 npm 相依性的自動完成和動態顯示資訊功能。

trans-unit.source: Npm task detection: failed to parse the file {0}
trans-unit.target: Npm 工作刪除: 解析檔案 {0} 失敗

trans-unit.source: The npm script to customize.
trans-unit.target: 要自訂的 npm 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The path to the folder of the package.json file that provides the script. Can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 提供指令碼 package.json 檔案的資料夾路徑。可以省略。

trans-unit.source: NPM Scripts
trans-unit.target: Npm 指令碼

trans-unit.source: Refresh
trans-unit.target: 重新整理

trans-unit.source: Run
trans-unit.target: 執行

trans-unit.target: 偵錯

trans-unit.source: Open
trans-unit.target: 開啟

trans-unit.source: Run Install
trans-unit.target: 執行安裝

trans-unit.source: Run Script
trans-unit.target: 執行指令碼

trans-unit.source: Run NPM Script in Folder...
trans-unit.target: 執行資料夾中的 NPM 指令碼...

trans-unit.source: Npm task detection: failed to parse the file {0}
trans-unit.target: Npm 工作刪除: 解析檔案 {0} 失敗

trans-unit.target: 預設 bower.json

trans-unit.source: Request to the bower repository failed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 對 Bower 儲存機制的要求失敗: {0}

trans-unit.source: latest
trans-unit.target: 最新

trans-unit.source: Default package.json
trans-unit.target: 預設 package.json

trans-unit.source: Request to the NPM repository failed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 對 NPM 儲存機制的要求失敗: {0}

trans-unit.source: The currently latest version of the package
trans-unit.target: 封裝目前的最新版本

trans-unit.source: Matches the most recent major version (1.x.x)
trans-unit.target: 比對最新的主要版本 (1.x.x)

trans-unit.source: Matches the most recent minor version (1.2.x)
trans-unit.target: 比對最新的次要版本 (1.2.x)

trans-unit.source: Latest version: {0}
trans-unit.target: 最新版本: {0}

trans-unit.source: Could not find a valid npm script at the selection.
trans-unit.target: 在選取範圍中找不到有效的 npm 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Could not launch "{0}" for debugging because the scripts lacks a node debug option, e.g. "--inspect-brk".
trans-unit.target: 因為指令碼缺少節點偵錯選項 (例如 '--inspect-brk')，所以無法啟動 "{0}" 以進行偵錯。

trans-unit.source: Learn More
trans-unit.target: 深入了解

trans-unit.source: OK
trans-unit.target: 確定

trans-unit.source: No scripts found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到任何指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The setting "npm.autoDetect" is "off".
trans-unit.target: 設定 "npm.autoDetect" 為 "off"。

trans-unit.source: Run Script
trans-unit.target: 執行指令碼

trans-unit.source: Run the script as a task
trans-unit.target: 以工作形式執行指令碼

trans-unit.source: Debug Script
trans-unit.target: 對指令碼偵錯

trans-unit.source: Runs the script under the debugger
trans-unit.target: 在偵錯工具中執行指令碼
